job title: Prospect Management and Client Coverage – Data Analyst
job description:
Position Description
The PMCC Data Analyst will play a key role in providing reporting and analytics support to the team through the management of individual and corporate prospecting data, as well as monitoring the usage of the Coverage Central application. The PMCC Data Analyst’s specific responsibilities will include:
  • Developing quantitative/analytic tools and models and customized reporting for senior management
  • Creating business requirements to enhance statistical analysis
  • Performing analysis to support prospecting policy decisions and provide effective decision support on ad-hoc business initiatives
  • Creating presentations for senior management
  • Liaising with business and technology partners to produce useful reporting tools
  • Ensuring the integrity of data, including data extraction, storage, manipulation, processing and analysis
Skills Required
3-5 years’ experience in an analytical role with direct responsibility for extracting and analyzing data patterns, development of analytic tools and reporting capabilities. Ability to work effectively and independently on multiple tasks, with multiple stakeholders at all levels across various functional areas.
Advanced and detailed understanding of MS Office Tools including Excel and Access with an ability to interpret numeric data and manage large data sets. The ability to work effectively on a team, outstanding communication and interpersonal skills (both written and oral), demonstrated leadership skills. Flexible, self-motivator, driven and enthusiastic. A strong desire and commitment to understand the global wealth management business.
